oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena

Class OracleSemQueryPlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena.OracleSemQueryPlan

  • public class OracleSemQueryPlan
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements BindingQueryPlan by translating a query into a single SDO_RDF_MATCH-based SQL query.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONST_FIVE_COL
      A constant denoting that there are five columns for a variable binding.
      static java.lang.String CONST_ONE_COL
      A constant denoting that there is only one column for a variable binding (RDFVID).
      static java.lang.String CONST_TWO_COL
      A constant denoting that there are two columns for a variable binding.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OracleSemQueryPlan(org.apache.jena.graph.Graph graph, org.apache.jena.graph.Node[] variables)
      Constructs a new instance based on the given instance of GraphOracleSem, query, and variables.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String convert(org.apache.jena.graph.Node var)
      Converts a variable Node to a String format that can be consumed by Oracle SQL.
      static java.lang.String formatNode(org.apache.jena.graph.Node n, int iModelID)
      This method format a Jena Node into a String form that can be accepted by Oracle SQL.

    • Field Detail

      • CONST_FIVE_COL

        public static final java.lang.String CONST_FIVE_COL
        A constant denoting that there are five columns for a variable binding.

      • CONST_ONE_COL

        public static final java.lang.String CONST_ONE_COL
        A constant denoting that there is only one column for a variable binding (RDFVID). This used when cache is on.

      • CONST_TWO_COL

        public static final java.lang.String CONST_TWO_COL
        A constant denoting that there are two columns for a variable binding.

      • OracleSemQueryPlan

        public OracleSemQueryPlan(org.apache.jena.graph.Graph graph,

        Constructs a new instance based on the given instance of GraphOracleSem, query, and variables.
        Parameters:
        graph - a Graph object
        variables - an array of nodes specifying variables

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public static java.lang.String convert(org.apache.jena.graph.Node var)
        Converts a variable Node to a String format that can be consumed by Oracle SQL. It takes care of the case that var is bNode.
        Parameters:
        var - - Jena Node to be converted, MUST not be NULL.

      • formatNode

        public static java.lang.String formatNode(org.apache.jena.graph.Node n,
                                          int iModelID)
        This method format a Jena Node into a String form that can be accepted by Oracle SQL.
        Parameters:
        n - RDF node
        Returns:
        formated string of @param n.
